<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate the exiting probabilities of all exiting edges from the loop,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// starting with the LatchExitProbability.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Heuristic for profitability: If any of the exiting blocks&#39; probability of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// exiting the loop is larger than exiting through the latch block, it&#39;s not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// profitable to predicate the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;LatchBlock = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getLoopLatch();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LatchBlock &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Should have a single latch at this point!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;LatchTerm = LatchBlock-&gt;getTerminator();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LatchTerm-&gt;getNumSuccessors() == 2 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;expected to be an exiting block with 2 succs!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LatchBrExitIdx =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="normal">      LatchTerm-&gt;getSuccessor(0) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getHeader() ? 1 : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We compute branch probabilities without BPI. We do not rely on BPI since</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Loop predication is usually run in an LPM and BPI is only preserved</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// lossily within loop pass managers, while BPI has an inherent notion of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// being complete for an entire function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the latch exits into a deoptimize or an unreachable block, do not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// predicate on that latch check.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;LatchExitBlock = LatchTerm-&gt;getSuccessor(LatchBrExitIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;UnreachableInst&gt;</a>(LatchTerm) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="normal">      LatchExitBlock-&gt;getTerminatingDeoptimizeCall())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Latch terminator has no valid profile data, so nothing to check</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// profitability on.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a763fc760b3f95cdd3389fdb004122381">hasValidBranchWeightMD</a>(&#42;LatchTerm))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ComputeBranchProbability =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitingBlock,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitBlock) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a> = ExitingBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumSucc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a>-&gt;getNumSuccessors();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;ProfileData = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6da87e96231847cc11de9fd5d5020d40">getValidBranchWeightMDNode</a>(&#42;Term)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> Weights;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(ProfileData, Weights);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t Numerator = 0, Denominator = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;i, Weight&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">llvm::enumerate</a>(Weights)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a>-&gt;getSuccessor(i) == ExitBlock)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal">          Numerator += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal">        Denominator += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If all weights are zero act as if there was no profile data</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Denominator == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(1, NumSucc);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(Numerator, Denominator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LatchBlock != ExitingBlock &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Latch term should always have profile data!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No profile data, so we choose the weight as 1/num&#95;of&#95;succ(Src)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(1, NumSucc);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> LatchExitProbability =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><Highlight kind="normal">      ComputeBranchProbability(LatchBlock, LatchExitBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Protect against degenerate inputs provided by the user. Providing a value</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// less than one, can invert the definition of profitable loop predication.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">float</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScaleFactor = <a href="#a2ca9d1eca702301022d91b79c39b14a7">LatchExitProbabilityScale</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ScaleFactor &lt; 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><Highlight kind="normal">        &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Ignored user setting for loop-predication-latch-probability-scale: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><Highlight kind="normal">        &lt;&lt; <a href="#a2ca9d1eca702301022d91b79c39b14a7">LatchExitProbabilityScale</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;The value is set to 1.0\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><Highlight kind="normal">    ScaleFactor = 1.0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LatchProbabilityThreshold = LatchExitProbability &#42; ScaleFactor;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;ExitEdge : ExitEdges) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> ExitingBlockProbability =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><Highlight kind="normal">        ComputeBranchProbability(ExitEdge.first, ExitEdge.second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Some exiting edge has higher probability than the latch exiting edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No longer profitable to predicate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExitingBlockProbability &gt; LatchProbabilityThreshold)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have concluded that the most probable way to exit from the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop is through the latch (or there&#39;s no profile information and all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// exits are equally likely).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If we can (cheaply) find a widenable branch which controls entry into the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loop, return it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973" lineLink="#ad459fdaea6898de5c02c8ed651ae50c9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;<a href="#ad459fdaea6898de5c02c8ed651ae50c9">FindWidenableTerminatorAboveLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Walk back through any unconditional executed blocks and see if we can find</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a widenable condition which seems to control execution of this loop.  Note</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that we predict that maythrow calls are likely untaken and thus that it&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// profitable to widen a branch before a maythrow call with a condition</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// afterwards even though that may cause the slow path to run in a case where</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it wouldn&#39;t have otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = L-&gt;getLoopPreheader();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!BB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a59fb91d1691350f7d1b8e8a114e3f2a4">getSinglePredecessor</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BB == Pred-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a79c007dcf9fff57e1569e778d7885b5e">getSingleSuccessor</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><Highlight kind="normal">        BB = Pred;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a59fb91d1691350f7d1b8e8a114e3f2a4">getSinglePredecessor</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(Pred-&gt;getTerminator()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0) == BB &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9d7f27a51d40f21ec17a854a6a5d5d4f">isWidenableBranch</a>(BI))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return the minimum of all analyzeable exit counts.  This is an upper bound</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><Highlight kind="comment">/// on the actual exit count.  If there are not at least two analyzeable exits,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><Highlight kind="comment">/// returns SCEVCouldNotCompute.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This implements an analogous, but entirely distinct transform from the main</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><Highlight kind="comment">/// loop predication transform.  This one is phrased in terms of using a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><Highlight kind="comment">/// widenable branch &#42;outside&#42; the loop to allow us to simplify loop exits in a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><Highlight kind="comment">/// following loop.  This is close in spirit to the IndVarSimplify transform</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of the same name, but is materially different widening loosens legality</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sharply.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopPredication::predicateLoopExits(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/virtregmap-cpp/#a1ad52109a2ff430460c8776286b97b2e">Rewriter</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The transformation performed here aims to widen a widenable condition</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// above the loop such that all analyzeable exit leading to deopt are dead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It assumes that the latch is the dominant exit for profitability and that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// exits branching to deoptimizing blocks are rarely taken. It relies on the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// semantics of widenable expressions for legality. (i.e. being able to fall</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// down the widenable path spuriously allows us to ignore exit order,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unanalyzeable exits, side effects, exceptional exits, and other challenges</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which restrict the applicability of the non-WC based version of this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// transform in IndVarSimplify.)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NOTE ON POISON/UNDEF - We&#39;re hoisting an expression above guards which may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// imply flags on the expression being hoisted and inserting new uses (flags</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are only correct for current uses).  The result is that we may be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inserting a branch on the value which can be either poison or undef.  In</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this case, the branch can legally go either way; we just need to avoid</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// introducing UB.  This is achieved through the use of the freeze</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 16&gt;</a> ExitingBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getExitingBlocks(ExitingBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExitingBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Nothing to do.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Latch = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getLoopLatch();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SCEVCouldNotCompute&gt;</a>(LatchEC))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// profitability - want hot exit in analyzeable set</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At this point, we have found an analyzeable latch, and a widenable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// condition above the loop.  If we have a widenable exit within the loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (for which we can&#39;t compute exit counts), drop the ability to further</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// widen so that we gain ability to analyze it&#39;s exit count and perform this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// transform.  TODO: It&#39;d be nice to know for sure the exit became</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// analyzeable after dropping widenability.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChangedLoop = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The use of umin(all analyzeable exits) instead of latch is subtle, but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// important for profitability.  We may have a loop which hasn&#39;t been fully</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// canonicalized just yet.  If the exit we chose to widen is provably never</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// taken, we want the widened form to &#42;also&#42; be provably never taken.  We</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can&#39;t guarantee this as a current unanalyzeable exit may later become</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// analyzeable, but we can at least avoid the obvious cases.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitingBB : ExitingBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If our exiting block exits multiple loops, we can only rewrite the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
